resources.string:
How did it become so popular? 

What has changed over time and what characteristics have persisted over the decades? 

This APP tells the story of the first and most popular superhero in the world, analyzes the cultural phenomenon that the John Kenedy has become, considering the influences he has been suffering, not only from time, but from all the media he passes through ( comics, radio, television, cinema). 

Of course, the iconic figure of Little John, his co-workers Tessa and Jake Olsen, his boss Christy White, as well as archenemy Sweet Lindsey could not be left out of this biography.
